snippet: In a complaint filed Monday, the American Civil Liberties Union accuses Morgan Stanley of fueling the production of risky, expensive loans that targeted African-American borrowers.
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union is filing lawsuit against Morgan Stanley, accusing it of fueling the production of risky, expensive loans that targeted African-American borrowers; claims investment bank is culpable for predatory loans made through now-defunct New Century Financial Corp.
lead_paragraph: In a complaint filed Monday, the American Civil Liberties Union accuses Morgan Stanley of fueling the production of risky, expensive loans that targeted African-American borrowers.

headline.seo: A.C.L.U. to Sue Morgan Stanley Over Mortgage Loans
headline.main: A.C.L.U. Sues Morgan Stanley Over Mortgage Loans
